mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`COLLECTOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`GRADE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`OWNER`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`, t1.`PATH`, t1.`ROOT`, t1.`SHORT`, t1.`TYPE` FROM `zt_module` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID ) t1 where id=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`GRADE`, t1.`ID`, CONCAT('/',(select GROUP_CONCAT(tt.name SEPARATOR '/') from zt_module tt where FIND_IN_SET(tt.id,t1.path) and tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root)) as `NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`OWNER`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`, t1.`PATH`, t1.`ROOT`, t1.`SHORT`, t1.`TYPE` FROM `zt_module` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID WHERE t1.DELETED = '0' AND t1.type = 'story'

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`GRADE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`OWNER`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`, t1.`PATH`, t1.`ROOT`, t1.`SHORT`, t1.`TYPE` FROM `zt_module` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID WHERE t1.DELETED = '0'

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`GRADE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`OWNER`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`, t1.`PATH`, t1.`ROOT`, t1.`SHORT`, t1.`TYPE` FROM `zt_module` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID WHERE t1.DELETED = '0' AND ( t1.`TYPE` = 'doc' AND t1.`ROOT` = #{srf.datacontext.product} )

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`GRADE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`OWNER`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`, t1.`PATH`, t1.`ROOT`, t1.`SHORT`, t1.`TYPE` FROM `zt_module` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID WHERE t1.DELETED = '0' AND ( t1.`TYPE` = 'line' )

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`GRADE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`OWNER`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`, t1.`PATH`, t1.`ROOT`, t1.`SHORT`, t1.`TYPE` FROM `zt_module` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID WHERE t1.DELETED = '0' AND ( t1.`ROOT` = #{srf.webcontext.product} AND t1.`TYPE` = 'story' AND t1.`BRANCH` = #{srf.datacontext.branch} 1=1 )

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`GRADE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`OWNER`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`, t1.`PATH`, t1.`ROOT`, t1.`SHORT`, t1.`TYPE` FROM `zt_module` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID WHERE t1.DELETED = '0' AND ( t1.`ROOT` = #{srf.datacontext.project} AND t1.`TYPE` = 'task' )

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`COLLECTOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`GRADE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`OWNER`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`, t1.`PATH`, t1.`ROOT`, t1.`SHORT`, t1.`TYPE` FROM `zt_module` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID WHERE t1.DELETED = '0'
